index() → {undefined}

Indexes the ItemCollection based on the current filter function, sortBy function, and reversed flag. Each Item in the collection will have it's index value set based on the filter/sortBy/reversed version of the ItemCollection items. If Items are filtered out via the filter function, the Item index will be set to -1. The Layout#getRenders method can check if item.index is -1 to decide if the Item should be displayed.
Source:
  • itemcollection.js, line 282
Returns:
Type
undefined
